Generation VI.X: They fly around on moonless nights and attack careless prey. Nothing can beat them in a battle in the dark.
Generation VI.Y: The ultrasonic waves it emits from its ears can reduce a large boulder to pebbles. It swoops out of the dark to attack.
Generation VI.Omega Ruby: They fly around on moonless nights and attack careless prey. Nothing can beat them in a battle in the dark.
Generation VI.Alpha Sapphire: The ultrasonic waves it emits from its ears can reduce a large boulder to pebbles. It swoops out of the dark to attack.

Generation VII.Ultra Sun: Although it has a violent disposition, if you give it a nice ripe fruit that it loves, Noivern will suddenly become tame.
Generation VII.Ultra Moon: This hot-blooded Pokémon attacks anything it sees with ultrasonic waves that can crush boulders.

Generation VIII.Sword: Aggressive and cruel, this Pokémon will ruthlessly torment enemies that are helpless in the dark.
Generation VIII.Shield: Flying through the darkness, it weakens enemies with ultrasonic waves that could crush stone. Its fangs finish the fight.

Generation IX.Scarlet: Ultrasonic waves emitted by a Noivern can pulverize a large boulder. This Pokémon has a cruel disposition.
Generation IX.Violet: In the dark, even Hydreigon are terrified of this Pokémon. But in the light, Noivern is the one that avoids battle.

Generation VIII.Shield: Lake of Outrage Bridge Field ( Wanderer ) Axew's Eye ( Max Raid Battle )
